item.title: leve3-베스트앨범
item.description: https://school.programmers.co.kr/learn/courses/30/lessons/42579 나의 풀이 def solution(genres, plays): genreList = {} genreSum = {} bestAlbum = [] for i, genre in enumerate(genres): #initialize genreList # genre : [(3, 800), (0, 500), (2, 150)] songArr = genreList.get(genre, []) songArr.append((i, plays[i])) genreList[genre] = songArr #initialzie genreSum # genre : 1450, genre2 : 3100 ... genreSum[genre] = genreSum.get(genre, 0) + plays[i] #sort genreList for lst in genreList.values(): lst.sort(key=lambda x: -x[1]) #sort genre sum queue = [] for genre in genreSum: queue.
